about_the_game:
Dive into the magical land of Isekai Cowboy, a JRPG - inspired by classics such as Dragon Quest and Final Fantasy - where you take over the role of a cowboy, finding himself in a fantastical world. Solve many mysteries, find out why you were brought here and how to escape.

The world you are currently within is being threatened by a demon king, but why? And why are you the one who was brought to stop him? How were you even brought here to begin with? Explore the world, meet new and interesting people*, some who may even join you on your journey.





Combat - A traditional fighting system, not so different from the likes of many JRPGs back in the 8 and 16 bit era. Battle it out with various enemies and bosses as you make your way through the world.

Open World - Explore the land around you to uncover some of the secrets it holds, or maybe even find treasures to help you fulfill other roles. Explore a variety of different locations from goblin forests, water catacombs.

Romance - Meet and romance one of the many characters in this game. Take them to one of the dating spots and enjoy some alone time with them, get to know them, find out their likes and dislikes.

(Subject to change)

content_descriptors.notes: There are girls in a cafe that dress in scantily clad outfits (bunny girl outfits), there are also situations where you will see skin, but nothing explicit, if you romance the girls, or in a few cases where you accidently walk in on them during risque moments.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
